body:
Successfully installs on macOS 10.15.7 with Python 3.8.11 and Apple Clang 12.0.0.

Also adds a new `py-tomli` package. This package can be built from source using `flit`, but `flit` doesn't seem to have an option to control the installation prefix. For now, I'm just installing the wheel.
title: py-black: add new version, missing dep
